Free food and Coursework

Hey anyone who's reading this... you know, you should find some better way of wasting your life... like... writing me a comment! - hehe

Work was a bit boring today.... I went in early...ish (8AM) and worked through till twelve, looking forward to seeing my friends at lunch, but then I was told I had to go to this technical talk thing.... but oh well... I had free food... but it meant I had to work an extra half hour at the end of the day to make up the time.... Damn annoying!! but the food was good...

Then I came home and we had to tidy up the flat a bit and go shopping before we could cook dinner... it was like half nine before we had our stir-fry!

Now I've just finished a piece of coursework on a management course that my work makes me do... oh well... it wasn't too bad... I made up a load of stuff about things I needed to improve on... just like being back in school really!!... - lol

End of another week

So... it's the end of the week,

Yay... i finish work at one on a friday!!! I had free lunch in work today... it was very groovy... they had KETTLE CHIPS! hehe

Fridays are kool... they're the only day of the working week when I'm out of work when it's still light outside! - hehe

Just had Pizza too! mmmmm it's a good week... and a good day!

Anyways, time for more lashings of boredness! - hehe

If you're rading this... hope you had a good week

Chris X

Walking Topless

Hehe... it was blooody freezing this morning, and I went for a walk with my flat mate and his gf on the local hills like... we walked round town a bit too...

..But anyways, it was freeezing, and I was soo wrapped up when we left the flat, but then, by the time we were walking up the hill I was boiling... so I took off my coat, hoodie, and tshirt... i was walking up this hill topless... it was greaat to see everyone's looks! - haha... there were people walking their dogs, and they were all wrapped up warm, and there was me... just wearing jeans, boxers and shoes! - hehe

But then I got onto the top of the hill, and the wind picked up, so i had to put some more clothes on! - hehe

Anyways, it was great!!

Worn out now though.. all that walking!!

oranges don't taste like carrots...

I want a Schecter Omen guitar... it's blue and shiny and and and... I'm getting one next week, I just want it now!! lol

GUITAAAR

I finaaaallly got my guitar on Wednesday... and it's awesome.. but grrrr it took agees to get to me!!! I ordered it from a shop in Birmingham, and they had to get it sent down from another store in Hull; they told me it would be around 3 working days... which was fine

BUT... I rang up after three days, and they said "yeah, it's here"... so I went in, and then they were like "oh... we made a mistake... it's not here".. which is fair enough... I can understand... it took another week after that before it was actually there!!!... grrrrr! - lol

Oh well.. it's here now, and black and awesome and... oh so shiny!!!

Schecter Omen 6 by the way...

Anyways... enough of this for a bit!.. talk to me!

Cycling topless

Okay, so walking topless is one thing... especially when it's coooold up on the top of the hill... but cycling topless??... you must be crazy!!!

Well, apparently I am.. cos that's what I did today... got some weird looks, and it was worth it just for that!!!...

I mean... I wasn't trying to show off or anything... I was just too bloody warm!! (seee... if I was posing there, I would have put hot! - hehe)

but the ride down was awesome... well... let's explain that!.. I cycled up a hill... so coming back was all downhill... it was amazing...

Anyways yeh... i'm still topless, and cooling down a bit now, so I'm off to go find a top!!

Love Chris XxX

Thursdays

Guess what people who I don't know who are reading my blog thingymawotsit... it's THURSDAY...

That means it's practically Friday, which means it's pretty much the weekend, which means it's almost next week, which makes it pretty close to the week after, which means it's almost CHRISTMAS!!... (and by that logic.... it's practically next year, pretty much summer... and yeh... i'm almost DEAD!... - oh well... cna't have everything I guess!!)

(though no matter what the proximity of christmas or my death is... i'm still bored... so yeh... muchos talking would be most appreciated!!)

Wondering

Well, I was sat here after coming back from town, and was just thinking and wondering about stuff...

I started to wonder about why people think about the things they do, and why people have preconceptions about things.

Like, why ginger people always get made fun of... what's wrong with being ginger?... (or red-heads if I'm being diplomatic!)...

Or, why what makes people attractive?... Why do we think some people look 'hot', but others not so much.

Why is some stuff just rubbish, but other stuff 'art'?

Why do colours in a room or on the clothes we wear go together?... why do we think that some colours really don't go?...

Why do we have a favourite colour, why does that colour say something about us?... what made someone decide what colours could/would say about people...

Okay, so I don't expect answers to these questions, though there are probably answers to some of them somewhere, and perhaps a few seperate and different answers to some questions, but all equally valid.

Anyways yeh... it made me think a bit, and that's not always a bad thing (especially when you cross the road!)

Love Chris XxX

Anyways yeh... what i'm trying to say is i'm bored! - hehe -

Take care everyone... thanks for reading

Chris XxX

Blue

I would like to inform the world that 'Blue' is infact a colour... with a very bluish tinge... and not a lot of yellow.. or red... unless it's turqoise, because then it would have a bit of yellow in it too... but it's not turqoise, because it's blue... so there... hope that has enlightened you all!

Today...

oooh - I got up, and no1 wanted to go to town, so I went for a cycle on the Malvern Hills... it was really good... then it started raining (not so good)... i got some weird looks lying down on this bench at the top of this hill with my bike beside me!....

Everyone was in like fleeces, but I was boiling because of the cycling.. I was half tempted to take my Tshirt off too... I was roasting... but the ride back down was awsome!... just freewheeling all the way....

There was some really cheesy music!!!... but some nice people! -

Overall, yep a good night... now I must go and buy food to cook because I'm hungry!!

Take care anyone who's reading this!!
